long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Indux is a Productivity Software aiming to focus whoever uses it - This is the beta testing software. Whether you get distracted by going on certain websites or need help planning workflows and tasks, Indux has your back. Not only can you block going on certain websites and plan workflows effectively at the start of each day, but you can also check your productivity metrics on your dashboard.
